scripts.startdev:
nodemon --watch src --watch package.json -e ts,json -q -x 'rm -fr dist && echo "
============
COMPILING...
============

" && tsc || return 0 && node dist/main/index.js'
scripts.testdev:
nodemon --watch src --watch package.json -e ts,json -q -x 'rm -fr dist && echo "
============
COMPILING...
============

" && tsc || return 0 && tape "dist/test/**/*.js"'
